attributes.action: to get britian out of the europeon union {eu}
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since he singed the eu treaty the best he could do is get brtian out of the eu so that britain can have independnce and have the britsh identy once agian.

we faught in ww2 for britsh independnce and the goverment has undone all the hard work the britsh people faught for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
